MEItemInfoDialog* MEItemInfoDialog::instance (  MEMapArea *  mapArea  )  [static]
 

Create a ItemInfo dialog.

Done via this static method to make sure that only one ItemInfo dialog is created.

Parameters:
mapArea The MEMapArea where the street segment is displayed.
Returns:
An info dialog.
